com.finra.assignment.fileuploader.services

Class NewFilesNotificationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.finra.assignment.fileuploader.services.NewFilesNotificationService

  • @Service
 @PropertySource(value="classpath:/application.yml")
public class NewFilesNotificationService
extends java.lang.Object
    Service for sending e-mail notifications containing the list of newly added files
